version_description:
Enabled checks for multiple logins
Removed background image from login & registration screen as they used to cause application to crash
Adjusted the alignment of the logo in the splash screen
Updated the google plus icon in login to be only google sign in as g+ is deprecated
Social media links updated
Bugs Fixes

- Bugs fixes
- UI improvements
- Download performance improvements
Check out our new fresh look with the dark theme and video player.

New User Interface Design: Improvements were made in accordance with current design trends.

New User Experience: Changes have been made considering simplicity, ease of use and functionality.

Performance Optimization: Noor Play is now faster.

Download: Download bugs are fixed.

Continue Watching: Keep watching on any device where you left off.

Parallel Streaming: Watch from two different screens at the same time.

My List: Add titles to your list and watch them later.

And much more..

Movies and Kids sections added,

Customer Code and Subscription Code improvements made,

Bugs fixed.

- Bilingual support "support the subtitles in bilingual English/Arabic for Resurrection Ertugrul series only. The rest of the content will be supported on the next time one by one"

- Try Free trial. With no commitments. You can cancel at anytime

- Bug fixes

- Landing page Added.
- Performance optimizations and Bugs Fixed.

Sign Up / Login with phone number feature added,

Skip Intro feature added,

Bugs Fixed.

Updates includes,

- New UI revamp
- Performance Optimisation
- New interactive services
